text: Por gum Barnabas Aikoniaman, mani Antiokan kav muuŋgi tɨvara mbui. Mani vov, mbe Zudaiŋ Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phena vhen verav Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuin mbe nzuai. Mani guigira Fhe Bakɨmen bunin vhuuiŋ, mani suambara vhuuŋra ntan mbe mbuim, Zudaiŋ vhɨrvera gum Grikiŋ vhɨrvera, mbe mani nzuai buni khothɨgi.
